SEARCH
Package se.swedenconnect.ca.engine.ca.repository.impl

Class SerializableCertificateRecord

java.lang.Object
se.swedenconnect.ca.engine.ca.repository.impl.SerializableCertificateRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
CertificateRecord
public class SerializableCertificateRecord extends Object implements CertificateRecord
Certificate record implementation with data stored in objects that are easier to serialize e.g. using a JSON serializer. This is done by converting Date to long and BigInteger to string.
Author:
Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)
